content: API3 QRNG is the first-party Quantum Random Number Generator served as a public utility courtesy of the Australia National Universityâ€™s Quantum Optics division. Delivered onto 13 blockchain protocols, API3 is running a series of workshops focused on API3 QRNG.This upcoming event is a demonstration of how to use the data feed within a dynamic NFT mint. Link to the Workshop: https://discord.com/events/758003776174030948/989074911362433044Discord: https://discord.com/invite/qnRrcfnm5W
